text: Gordy is an American family comedy-drama movie from 1995. The movie is about a piglet named Gordy who searches for his missing family (who are taken away to a slaughterhouse in Omaha, Nebraska). Gordy experiences the lives of other people who are part of the movie's side stories, including traveling country music singers Luke McAllister and his daughter Jinnie Sue; and lonely boy Hanky Royce whose mother is engaged to a sinister businessman, Gilbert Sipes. Gordy changes lives for the people he encounters due to their ability to understand him. The movie was released to theaters on May 12, 1995. It was distributed by Miramax Family Films. The movie has the song "Pig Power" by Tag Team. A music video was produced for the song, featuring clips from the movie. == References == == Other websites == * * * Category:1990s family movies Category:1995 adventure movies Category:1995 comedy-drama movies Category:American family drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American buddy comedy movies Category:Disney movies Category:Miramax movies Category:Movies about pigs Category:Movies set in Nebraska Category:American family comedy movies Category:1990s American adventure movies Category:1990s English-language movies
title: Gordy
